item.value: All HTML and CSS changes should be commited to `src/` files only!
run website on local server and use local resoureses with next builds
build pug files to html and use local resources instead of CDN
By default all static resources refer to CDN host. To use local resources (for dev purpose only), you can call same gulp tasks with ` -local` argument
build both pug and less files
build less files to css
build pug files to html
run website on local server
And then, you can use gulp to compile less and pug files, read more about [Gulp](http://gulpjs.com/).
Run `npm install` under root dir to install npm packages.
Framework7's website to use these docs offline
Calendar could be used as inline component or as overlay. Overlay Calendar will be automatically converted to Popover on tablets (iPad).
Calendar is a touch optimized component that provides an easy way to handle dates.
Favorite Fruite
Simple Standalone Autocomplete
Standalone autocomplete provides better mobile UX by opening it in a new page or popup. Good to use when you need to get strict values without allowing free-type values.
Dropdown With Input Expand
Dropdown autocomplete is good to use as a quick and simple solution to provide more options in addition to free-type value.
Do something
Action Sheet can be automatically converted to Popover (for tablets). This button will open Popover on tablets and Action Sheet on phones:
